text: - Composition of saliva — Mostly water (97-99.5%), so hypo-osmotic — Slightly acidic (pH 6.75 to 7.00) — Electrolytes: Na*, K*, CI-, PO,2~, HCO,~ — Salivary amylase and lingual lipase — Proteins: mucin, lysozyme, and IgA — Metabolic wastes: urea and uric acid — Lysozyme, IgA, defensins, and nitric oxide from nitrates in food protect against microorganisms
